gui.under_control.fatal_error.title: Fatal error!
gui.under_control.incompatibility.title: Mod incompatibility found!
gui.under_control.incompatibility.messag: A mod incompatibility has been found with
A mod incompatibility has been found by the current server:
gui.under_control.incompatibility_pack.m: This server needs a different modpack version, you should update it.
gui.under_control.config_selector.title: Select the config file!
gui.under_control.config.reset_all.title: Reset all?
gui.under_control.config.reset_all.messa: This will reset every setting to it's default value, you can not undo this action.
gui.under_control.config.reset_option: Reset option to it's default value.
gui.under_control.config.option.log_extr: Logs extra information about what's going on with the library.
gui.under_control.config.option.allow_re: Allows the client the use of the render command.
gui.under_control.config.option.mod_inco: It allows the server to prevent a player from joining with an incompatible mod, or you can even use it as a small layer of security to prevent users from using malicious mods.
gui.under_control.config.option.log_on_r: Log info on reloads in chat.
Logs info on chat when the server reloads.
